oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Osborne Brothers performances - tape #2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various performances featuring the Osborne Brothers (performers), with guests Mac Wiseman (performer) and the Lewis Family (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Osborne Brothers; Mac Wiseman; Lewis Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Bluegrass Melodies (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next tune -- Bluegrass Express (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next tune -- Rockytop (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby and Sonny Osborne talk and thank the audience -- Bobby Osborne talks to the audience, asks for applause and introduces the next tune -- Midnight Flyer (Osborne Brothers) -- Love Gone Cold (Osborne Brothers) -- Memories Of Yesterday (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the Lewis Family -- Hallelujah Turnpike (Lewis Family) -- Sunday Christians (Lewis Family) -- Sonny Osborne talks about early country music bands -- Grey Eagle Hornpipe (Osborne Family) -- Sonny Osborne talks to the audience and introduces the band members -- Old Flames (Osborne Brothers, Paul Brewster vocals) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next tune -- Fastest Grass Alive (Osborne Brothers) -- Sonny Osborne introduces Mac Wiseman -- I Wonder How The Old Folks Are At Home (Mac Wiseman) -- Remembering (Mac Wiseman) -- Bobby Osborne jokes with the audience and introduce the next tune -- I'd Rather Live By The Side Of The Road (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next tune -- Bluegrass Melodies (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next tune -- Bluegrass Express (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next tune -- Rockytop (Osborne Brothers) -- Closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Osborne Brothers; Osborne, Bobby; Osborne, Sonny; Wiseman, Mac; Lewis Family (Bluegrass musical group);
